name: Madam Pompadour
instruction: In a tall glass, add sugar, Angostura, cherries, orange slice, peach, and ice. Add the mixture of lemon juice, orange juice, and cognac. Fill with Champagne.
note: Specialty of Charlie's Bar, Minneapolis, U.S.A.

name: Magnolia
instruction: Shake well, strain into a medium-sized wine glass, and fill balance with Champagne.

name: Man Jongg Cocktail
instruction: Shake well, strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Maiden's Blush Cocktail
instruction: Shake well and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Maka
instruction: In a tall glass with ice, add Creme de Cassis, gin, sweet vermouth, dry vermouth, and Campari. Add a slice of lemon and top with soda water.

name: Mamay Taylor
instruction: Put lemon slice and ice in a large tumbler. Add gin and fill with ginger ale. Stir slightly.

name: Mambo-Jambo
instruction: Shake well and strain into a cocktail glass.
note: By Mike Cordova, The Brown Derby, Los Angeles, U.S.A.

name: Manhattan Cocktail
instruction: Stir well and strain into a cocktail glass. Use Italian Vermouth for a sweet cocktail and French Vermouth for a dry cocktail.

name: Marmon Cocktail
instruction: Shake well and strain into a cocktail glass. Serve with a cherry.

name: Martini (Dry)
instruction: Stir well and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Martini (Medium)
instruction: Stir well and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Martini (Sweet)
instruction: Shake well, strain into a glass with a cherry.

name: May Blossom Fizz
instruction: Shake well and strain into a small tumbler. Fill with soda.

name: Mayfair Cocktail
instruction: Shake well and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Mighty Fine
instruction: Shake well and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Milk Punch
instruction: Add sugar, brandy, and rum to a shaker with ice. Fill with milk, shake, and strain into a medium-sized tumbler. Grate nutmeg on top.

name: Milk Shake
instruction: Shake sugar, egg, and milk with ice. Strain into a tumbler and grate nutmeg on top.

name: Millionaire Cocktail
instruction: Shake well and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Mimosa
instruction: Stir and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Mint Cocktail
instruction: Add all ingredients with mint sprigs. Shake well and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Mint Julep
ingredients: Slices of Orange, Lemon, Pineapple, and Cherries
instruction: Muddle mint with sugar and water. Remove mint, add bourbon and ice. Stir until frosted. Garnish with mint, fruits, and cherries.

name: Mississippi Mule Cocktail
instruction: Shake well and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Modern Cocktail
instruction: Shake well and strain into a cocktail glass with a cherry.

name: Moka Spitberg
instruction: Add ingredients to a tumbler with shaved ice. Shake gently and serve with a straw.

name: Monkey's Gland Cocktail
instruction: Shake well and strain into a cocktail glass.
note: Invented by the author, inspired by Voronoff's experiments in rejuvenation.

name: Montana Cocktail
instruction: Shake well, strain into a cocktail glass, and squeeze lemon peel on top.

name: Morning Cocktail
instruction: Stir well and strain into a cocktail glass with a cherry. Twist lemon peel on top.
note: Recipe by Harry Johnson, San Francisco.

name: Morning Glory Fizz
instruction: Shake well and strain into a tumbler. Fill with soda.

name: Moscow Mule
instruction: Add ice, lime juice, and vodka in a silver mug. Fill with ginger beer and garnish with cucumber peel or mint.

name: Mountain Cocktail
instruction: Shake well and strain into a cocktail glass with a cherry.
note: Recipe from Hoffman House, New York.
